name: Janine HUGHES, Appellant, v. COUNCIL 13, AMERICAN FEDERATION OF STATE, COUNTY, AND MUNICIPAL EMPLOYEES, AFL-CIO, and the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Public Welfare

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.

Mr. Justice MONTEMURO is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800, due to the unavailability of Mr. Justice LARSEN, see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
parties: Janine HUGHES, Appellant, v. COUNCIL 13, AMERICAN FEDERATION OF STATE, COUNTY, AND MUNICIPAL EMPLOYEES, AFL-CIO, and the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Public Welfare.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
Mr. Justice MONTEMURO is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800, due to the unavailability of Mr. Justice LARSEN, see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Edward A. Olds, Dolores Innamorato, Pittsburgh, for J. Hughes.
casebody.head_matter:
640 A.2d 410
Janine HUGHES, Appellant, v. COUNCIL 13, AMERICAN FEDERATION OF STATE, COUNTY, AND MUNICIPAL EMPLOYEES, AFL-CIO, and the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Public Welfare.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 5, 1994.
Decided April 22, 1994.
Edward A. Olds, Dolores Innamorato, Pittsburgh, for J. Hughes.
Alaine Williams, Philadelphia, for AFSCME.
Edward Carey, Pittsburgh, for DPW.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
